item.title: Just a little error!
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:16, topic:412007”][quote author=Kozs link=topic=513264.msg3726317#msg3726317 date=1314298273]

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:81: cannot find symbol symbol : method getClient(int) location: class server.model.players.Client Client d = c.getClient(S erver.playerHandler.players[i].playerId); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

IT changed a lil

[/quote]

Yes it did, apparently the getClient method isn’t in Client class.[/quote]

You mean public Client getClient(String victim) { Client c2 = null; for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(victim)) { c2 = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; } } } return c2; }

Read full topic

item.title: Just a little error!
item.dc:creator: @karcher977 karcher977
item.description:
@karcher977 wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:10, topic:412007”][quote author=karcher977 link=topic=513264.msg3726280#msg3726280 date=1314296958]

I’m working on a ::players command where it shows list of players.

[code] if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“players”)) {
c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Vestascape Online Players”, 8144);
c.getPA().sendFrame126(“Online players(” + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + “):”, 8145);
int line = 8147;
for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) {
Client d = c.getClient(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName);
if (d.playerName != null){
c.getPA().sendFrame126(d.playerName, line);
line++;
} else if (d.playerName == null) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", line);
}
}
}
c.flushOutStream();

		c.sendMessage("There are currently "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " players online.");
	    }[/code]

I really don’t understand compiliers so if you know issue could you explain how you found it that would be fantastic!

Error

[code]src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:81: cannot find symbol
symbol : method getClient(java.lang.String)
location: class server.model.players.Client
Client d = c.getClient(S
erver.playerHandler.players[i].playerName);
^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code]

Fancy Making a Server soon
[/quote]

can any1 help???[/quote]

do you have teamviewer i think i know what it is

Read full topic
